title: Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions:
1. In a bowl, marinate chicken slices in soy sauce and sesame oil for 15 minutes.
2. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
3. Add chicken to the skillet and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
4. Remove chicken from skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add bell pepper, onion, garlic, and ginger. Cook until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes.
6. Add broccoli florets and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
7. Return cooked chicken to the skillet and toss everything together.
8. Serve the chicken stir-fry over cooked rice.
